articles.description: The Brighton & Hove Albion midfielder impressed in his side's 2-2 draw with West Ham and has been linked with a move to Liverpool
articles.content:
With Gini Wijnaldums contract up in the summer, there are plenty of question marks over how Liverpools midfield will look next season.

articles.author: Freddie Keighley
articles.title: Mikel Arteta opens up on "big headache" which is giving him sleepless nights - Mirror Online
articles.description: Arsenal upset the odds to beat bitter rivals Chelsea 3-1 in their last outing, but it was a rare league victory in a dismal season which has taken its toll on manager Arteta
articles.content:
Mikel Arteta claimed management is "a much harder job than playing" as he opened up on his confusion at Arsenal's poor form this season.
 Arteta, 38, enjoyed an accomplished career as a midfielder w… [+3583 chars]
